segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so naughty, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless they're being, someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman must be really tired or something to not notice any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery with all that water, it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to say something, but I'm not sure what to do.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just so frustrating to watch, seeing the woman so distracted and the kids being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but it seems like it's only a matter of time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless they're all being, it's just not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
